entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet-watch]: Watch project output binaries and notify Roslyn on project rebuild #48592

PullRequests

Created

  • Add --os, --arch and --cross in VMR build script #48591

Merged

  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Use inline boot config in tests #48590
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk

Updated

  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Select the NativeAOT runtime pack as the target package when it's provided as part of the KnownILCompilerPack metadata #46611
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Disable loading code style analyzers when building from VS #48522
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
